item.title: Clonezilla
item.description: Reference Official website - Download Clonezilla iso Forum - 再生龍Clonezilla製作還原檔及還原光碟 Instruction - Ubuntu hard disk read only Youtube - 再生龍拷貝硬碟 Stack Overflow - Clonezilla script fails: Unable to find target hard drive Usage To clone a hard disk partition from a dual-boot system Requirements A USB flash drive
